.. _`bedtools intersect`:

BEDTOOLS INTERSECT
==================

Intersect BED/BAM/VCF files with bedtools.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule bedtools_merge:
        input:
            left="A.bed",
            right="B.bed"
        output:
            "A_B.intersected.bed"
        params:
            ## Add optional parameters 
            extra="-wa -wb" ## In this example, we want to write original entries in A and B for each overlap.
        log:
            "logs/intersect/A_B.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/bedtools/intersect"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
